summary_comment: Professor Culbertson is highly regarded as one of the best teachers at Ohio State University, known for his engaging and humorous teaching style that keeps students entertained while covering interesting material. He is praised for his knowledge and dedication to ensuring student success, often giving half the exam questions in advance and offering supportive encouragement to help students achieve high grades.
summary_comment_short: Professor Culbertson is highly regarded as one of the best teachers at Ohio State University, known for his engaging and humorous teaching style, and his dedication to ensuring student success. Students consistently praise his knowledge, supportive approach, and the ease of his classes, which often include practice exam questions and comprehensive online resources.

Ratings.comment: Best on the OSU campus.  Cares about students learning.

Coolest teacher I've had at OSU. Gives you half the exam questions before the tests.  He basically wants everyone in the class to get 100%. You're extremely lacking in intelligence if you get anything less than an A. He's supposedly leaving for a job on the west coast, though.  A damn shame.

By far one of my favorite classes AND profs. He is really funny and tells great stories- kept me laughing the whole time. Plus the material is interesting and he's very knowledgeable with an impressive background. The class is easy - notes are all online, no book, and he gives about half the exam questions out ahead of time. very straightforward.
Great guy! Very knowledgable.
Yes, this class is SO easy and you don't have to go. He's also probably the most interesting teacher at Ohio State.
Great man. Great teacher.
He is very nice. He wants you to get A. So, try a little bit and u achieve it.

Dr. Jeff Culbertson is the man!  Best class at OSU.  Very intelligent man with great stories (occasionally off topic but definitely gets you laughing) and he even offers inspirational words to his students.  TAKE THIS CLASS

He is a great professor and an overall great guy. Funny and makes his lectures interesting. If I could recommend something to anyone taking his class in the future- Try to get your hands on previous quarters exams. He gives them back to his students and often uses a lot of the same questions or all of them. That helps and it isn't cheating either.

great professor. has so much life experience, he tells stories most of class but they are interesting. truly cares about his students doing well in life. gives a document of notes to print out instead of a book and if you study from it and write in some extra he says you will get an A. 2, all multiple choice exams.
he made this the easiest class i have ever taken. he tells a ton of great stories which makes the class easy. this is by far the easiest A i have ever gotten. great class
Funny guy.
Very easy. He is my advisor as well as a prof. he is very interested in helping students, which is the only reason he is here. He is helpful, honest, and funny.

Dr. Culbertson is probably one of the best overall professors I've had being down here at main campus that isn't in my college department. He is extrememly witty and very intelligent. I would recommend attending the lectures because what he says, might be on the midterms unless you're taking it w/ a friend who can give you the notes. An honest A.

Dr. Culbertson is awesome! He was one of the most interesting professors that I have ever taken. His stories are crazy. He's one of the nicest guys you'll ever meet and understands students well. If you need an interesting class and want an A, this is definitely the class to take!

ABSOLUTELY GREAT! Makes class interesting and tells great stories. Really wants people to learn. You can tell he loves what he does and enjoys teaching. Going to class was enjoyable and highly recommended: it's easy to remember things when he applies them to real life.
Great Teacher.  If you have to take a second bio class I would recommend Mr. Culbertson's food science class.

He is a great teacher, very funny, and has a great way of teaching students who aren't interested in science. this is the best class to take for science GEC, very easy, great teacher and makes the subject interesting. One of the best science teachers at OSU!

Dr C is simly the best there is.  He delivered great lectures that were interesting & hilarious.  He even let us out of class early.  He answered all emails and went out of his way to be helpful.  OSU really could use more Professors like him!!

Best class I've ever had at OSU. Very fair, understands what it's like to be a college student. Notes are posted on Carmen and each Exam has give aways so you already know some of the answers. His lectures are interesting with his stories and the subject matter of the class isn't so bad itself. Definitely recommend.

Dr. Culbertson was one of the best professors I've ever had at Ohio State. He knows exactly what he's talking about, expresses ideas clearly, makes class fun, genuinely wants to help students, and he even created the frickin' Nutri-Grain bar! Take THIS class for your science GEC if you can!! Fun, interesting, and not too difficult.

So easy! If you go to class and pay even a little attention, you'll do fine. He pretty much always lets class out early. The tests are really easy and quick - like fifteen minutes. So easy, and a GEC.
Dr Culbertson is a great professor, he makes everything interesting and fun!  He tells some crazy stories, so be ready!  He almost always lets class out early, and is helpful with test preparation.

Really great teacher. Our class is an hour and 48 minutes but he usually teaches for about an hour and lets us go. You can tell he just really loves teaching, and it helps. He tells great stories too. 100% recommended.

You can easily receive an A if you actually try.  No textbook is needed which is nice and there are only 2 tests and one final.  He is pretty funny and entertaining in class. Definitely my favorite class. The class average for tests is usually a mid B.  Definitely recommend him.
Best of the best.
Slacker, but cool!
Extremely interesting lectures on mildly interesting material. Truly wants his students to do well. Highly recommend.
Awesome.  Best at OSU.  Student oriented, fair, great lectures, fair exams.

summary_comment: Professor Kent is highly regarded for his engaging and enjoyable teaching style, making complex topics accessible and interesting. Students consistently praise his light yet informative approach, particularly noting his ability to deliver concise and clear content, especially on topics related to alcohol, beer, and wine. His positive demeanor and willingness to assist students contribute significantly to the overall positive classroom experience.
summary_comment_short: Professor Kent delivers a highly engaging and informative course, making complex topics about alcohol, beer, and wine accessible and enjoyable. His teaching style is praised for being both light-hearted and effective, with students consistently recommending his class.

Ratings.comment: Very light course.
FUN/INTERESTING CLASS. Enjoyed coming to lecture and learning new information about alcohol.  Nice guy teacher too
Sweet class. Cool teacher and interesting topics. I'd recommend it to people who enjoy learning more about beer and wine.

A class to remember--Such interesting topics that were very concise and clear.  Professor was easy and nice to talk too. Helped when needed. Enjoyed powerpoint slides. Definitely got a lot out of this class!
One of my favorite courses I've taken at Ohio State! Great class and teacher
GREAT TEACHER AND CLASS!! Learned a lot while enjoying going to lecture.  Always had fun slides and made class enjoyable:) Would recommend this class to anyone interested in wine and beer!!

Really nice guy.  He is willing to help out in any way.  If you study the material, you'll do good on his exams.  Always has interesting lectures with great slides! Knows how to make people laugh and is easy to talk too! Great class and great teacher!!!

summary_comment: Professor Patel is known for his engaging and unconventional teaching style, incorporating practical demonstrations and pop culture references into his lectures. While some students appreciate his relaxed approach and the extra credit opportunities (like bringing autographed items), others criticize his frequent intoxication during classes, which affects his ability to help students effectively. Despite the mixed reviews, many students find his passion for the subject matter and commitment to their learning experience highly valuable.
summary_comment_short: Professor BD is known for his engaging and unconventional teaching style, incorporating hands-on demonstrations and pop culture references. Despite varying opinions on his availability and sobriety during classes, many students find his enthusiasm and dedication to the subject matter highly impactful.

Ratings.comment: Professor BD is the coolest, flyest, most easy-going professor ever. He presents a lot of hands on demonstrations like showing us how to properly fall asleep wherever after a night of going out. He also showed us how to properly apply pomade to a faded comb over. Furthermore, Professor BD took us on a class field trip to Ugly Tuna. HES SO COOL!!!!

He was practically drunk every class. So class was great you never had to do anything. Pretty sure he grades the Exams when he is getting bottle service at the bars. So he gives everyone an A. So don't feel so special if you pass. Helpfulness was poor due to the fact that he was never sober.

Relates course material with current events. He has me sipping on Dom Perignon for no reason just like my favorite musician Future. He even taught me how to do the Dab dance move the proper way so it doesnt look like I am checking to see if I put deodorant on. HINT: For extra credit bring autographed Braxton Miller items to class.

Must take class! Professor BD really knows what he's talking about and truly cares about his students. Exams are pretty fair and very similar to the practice ones on Carmen. Book isn't required, although might want to buy the Dom in bulk to save some money. BE PREPARED for the final. Will leave you exhausted the next day.
Words can not describe how amazing this class is, I look at life a completely different way!

summary_comment: Professor Folk is known for delivering high-quality lectures that are well-organized and comprehensive, effectively covering the course material. Students consistently praise his ability to explain complex concepts clearly and engage the class, contributing to a productive learning environment.
summary_comment_short: Professor Folk is known for delivering clear and comprehensive lectures, effectively enhancing students' understanding of the subject matter. His teaching quality is consistently high, making complex topics accessible and engaging.

Ratings.comment: No Comments

summary_comment: Professor Balasubramaniam's teaching quality is widely regarded as subpar, with students finding his lectures monotonous and boring, and the coursework overly diluted for a 630-level class. He has been criticized for incorrect information, partial grading, and a defensive attitude when questioned, making the class an unpleasant and largely unproductive experience despite it being mandatory.
summary_comment_short: Professor Balasubramaniam's teaching quality is widely criticized, with students finding his lectures monotonous and boring, and many of the course contents inaccurate or overly simplistic for a 630-level class. Students also report issues with partial grading and a defensive attitude from the professor when questioned about his teachings.

Ratings.comment: Half the things taught are incorrect. Very dilute coursework (200 level in a 630 class). Monotonous and boring lectures. Partial grading. Bad listener. Very defensive.If you tell him he was incorrect in teaching he would take it personally and you get a lower grade. Unfortunately FST 630 is a mandatory class. Just pay the money for nothing.
